item.description:
Please join us for the first of our food preservation workshops and make some strawberry jam! In this hands on workshop we will learn how to use fresh, ripe berries from a local farm to create a delicious preserve that will provide a taste of summer when the winter winds blow. Tory will be leading the group on this jamming adventure!

The loose agenda:
Noon- Meet and greet at Charlotte's kitchen
12:15- Start preparing berries while discussing equipment and methods
1:30- Put the berries on to cook and continue discussion
2:30-Pack the preserve into jars and start final processing
3:00- Wrap up and take home a jar of jam

The ten dollar fee for this workshop covers the cost of fresh berries, jars, pectin, sugar and a handouts. You will go home with (2) half pint jars of delicious strawberry jam and the knowledge to make more preserves!

Please bring a light snack or beverage to share with the group.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal who opens the door
item.name: Strawberry Preserves
